data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in Urawa.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Hiroshima in their own half.
Throw-in for Hiroshima in the half of Urawa.
Penalty! Jumpei Iida points to the spot, great chance for Urawa...
In the minute 5, It's advantage Urawa in Saitama as Leonardo scores from the spot to make it 1-0.
Throw-in for Urawa at Saitama Stadium 2002.
Hiroshima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 9, Ball safe as Hiroshima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Hiroshima in their own half.
Hiroshima are coming forward and Leandro Pereira gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 11, Urawa have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Saitama.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 16, Jumpei Iida awards the away team a throw-in.
In Saitama, Leandro Pereira (Hiroshima) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
In the minute 17, Jumpei Iida signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Urawa's half.
Jumpei Iida awards Urawa a goal kick.
Free kick for Hiroshima in the half of Urawa.
In the minute 20, Hiroshima's Hayao Kawabe misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Urawa at Saitama Stadium 2002.
Leandro Pereira of Hiroshima smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 21, Can Hiroshima capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Urawa's half?
Hiroshima are pushing forward but Leandro Pereira's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Urawa goal kick.
In the minute 22, Hiroshima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jumpei Iida signals a throw-in for Hiroshima, close to Urawa's area.
Free kick Hiroshima.
In the minute 27, Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Hiroshima's Leandro Pereira breaks free at Saitama Stadium 2002. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Urawa have a goal kick.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Urawa at Saitama Stadium 2002.
Throw-in for Urawa in their own half.
Jumpei Iida awards Hiroshima a goal kick.
In the minute 29, Throw-in Urawa.
Urawa to take a throw-in in Hiroshima territory.
Hiroshima needs to be cautious. Urawa have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 31, Ball safe as Urawa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in high up the field for Hiroshima in Saitama.
Leandro Pereira (Hiroshima) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 36, Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Jumpei Iida awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Hiroshima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Urawa's half?
In the minute 39, Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Urawa.
At Saitama Stadium 2002, Hayao Kawabe has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Urawa's Leonardo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 40, Goal kick for Hiroshima at Saitama Stadium 2002.
Throw-in for Hiroshima close to the penalty box.
Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
In the minute 42, In Saitama Hiroshima drive forward through Yoshifumi Kashiwa. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In Saitama a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Tomoya Ugajin (Urawa) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 44, Important block from the Urawa defence as Yuya Asano fires in a strike for Hiroshima.
In Saitama a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Rhayner for Hiroshima drives towards goal at Saitama Stadium 2002. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, 4 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Saitama.
Hiroshima have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Hiroshima in the half of Urawa.
In the minute 45, Urawa will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Hiroshima.
Sho Sasaki (Hiroshima) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Urawa goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second-half has started.
Hiroshima push forward at Saitama Stadium 2002 and Hayao Kawabe gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Urawa defence.
In the minute 46, Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
In the minute 48, Hiroshima drives forward and Leandro Pereira gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Can Hiroshima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Urawa's half?
In the minute 49, Jumpei Iida awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Hiroshima's Rhayner goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 51, In Saitama Hiroshima attack through Rhayner. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Saitama.
Throw-in Hiroshima.
In the minute 53, Rhayner gets his shot on target but fails to score for Hiroshima.
Throw-in high up the field for Hiroshima in Saitama.
Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
In the minute 55, Jumpei Iida awards Urawa a goal kick.
Tsukasa Morishima for Hiroshima gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Saitama.
In the minute 57, Ball safe as Urawa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The away team have replaced Rhayner with Yusuke Chajima. This is the first substitution made today by Hiroshi Jofuku.
Shunki Higashi is replacing Yuya Asano for the away team.
In the minute 58, Urawa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Koya Yuruki of Urawa gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Hiroshima at Saitama Stadium 2002.
In the minute 60, In Saitama, Yoshifumi Kashiwa of Hiroshima is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Throw-in for Hiroshima at Saitama Stadium 2002.
Hiroshima needs to be cautious. Urawa have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 62, Kosuke Taketomi is on a sub for Yuki Muto for Urawa.
Tsuyoshi Otsuki (Urawa) is making a second substitution, with Kenyu Sugimoto replacing Leonardo.
Ball goes out of play for a Urawa goal kick.
Throw-in for Hiroshima in their own half.
In the minute 65, The away team replace Yoshifumi Kashiwa with Tomoya Fujii.
Urawa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 66, Free kick Hiroshima.
Yusuke Chajima (Hiroshima) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Urawa have a goal kick.
In the minute 69, Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
Can Urawa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hiroshima's half?
Urawa's Tomoaki Makino has been booked in Saitama.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Urawa in their own half.
Hiroshima have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Hiroshima close to the penalty box.
In the minute 74, Douglas Vieira is replacing Leandro Pereira for Hiroshima at Saitama Stadium 2002.
Hiroshi Jofuku is making the team's fifth substitution at Saitama Stadium 2002 with Gakuto Notsuda replacing Toshihiro Aoyama.
Urawa make their third substitution with Takuya Iwanami replacing Koya Yuruki.
In the minute 75, Urawa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Hiroshima in the half of Urawa.
Jumpei Iida signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Urawa's half.
In the minute 78, Jumpei Iida signals a throw-in for Hiroshima, close to Urawa's area.
Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
Hiroshima's Hayao Kawabe misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 79, Goal kick for Urawa at Saitama Stadium 2002.
Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 83, Throw-in Hiroshima.
Urawa to take a throw-in in Hiroshima territory.
Throw-in for Hiroshima at Saitama Stadium 2002.
In the minute 84, Hiroshima have a dangerous throw-in.
Jumpei Iida awards the home team a throw-in.
Hiroshima's Gakuto Notsuda gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Urawa defender.
In the minute 86, Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
Hiroshima are coming forward and Hayao Kawabe gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Urawa goal kick.
In the minute 86, Urawa's Kosuke Taketomi is whistled for offside at Saitama Stadium 2002.
Ball safe as Urawa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Takuya Aoki is replacing Tomoya Ugajin for Urawa at Saitama Stadium 2002.
Jumpei Iida awards the home team a throw-in.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Urawa needs to be cautious. Hiroshima have an attacking throw-in.
Hiroshima are pushing forward but Gakuto Notsuda's finish is wide of the goal.
Jumpei Iida awards Urawa a goal kick.
Throw-in for Urawa at Saitama Stadium 2002.
Hiroshima are in shooting range from this free kick.
Hiroshima's Gakuto Notsuda breaks free at Saitama Stadium 2002. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Saitama.
It's 1-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
